name: streamifier
description: Converts a Buffer/String into a readable stream
readme: streamifier =========== #### Converts a Buffer/String into a readable stream #### [![npm][npm-image]][npm-url] ___module_.createReadStream(object[, options]) : Readable__ Returns a Readable stream. The `object` can be of any data type. If it is a Buffer or a string, the available `options` are [`highWaterMark` and `encoding`](http://nodejs.org/api/stream.html#stream_new_stream_readable_options), otherwise the Readable stream is automatically set in [object mode](http://nodejs.org/api/stream.html#stream_object_mode) and the `options` parameter is ignored. [npm-image]: https://img.shields.io/npm/v/streamifier.svg?style=flat [npm-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/streamifier
